statements.query: MATCH (n:CleverCloudUser) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete CleverCloud users that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (n:CleverCloudOrganisation) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete CleverCloud users that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:CleverCloudUser)-[r:MEMBER_OF]->(:CleverCloudOrganization) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:CleverCloudApplication) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

statements.query: MATCH (:CleverCloudApplication)-[r:USES]->(:CleverCloudAddon) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:CleverCloudApplication)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:CleverCloudOrganization) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
